node.title: What's your prefered revision control system?
node.author: theonetwo

data.field: [http://aegis.sourceforge.net/|Aegis] [http://www.gnu.org/software/gnu-arch/|arch revision control system] [http://www.bitmover.com/bitkeeper|BitKeeper] [http://www.cvshome.org|CVS] [http://www.perforce.com|Perforce] [http://msdn.microsoft.com/vstudio/previous/ssafe/|SourceSafe] [http://subversion.tigris.org|Subversion] I don't need no steenkin RCS! Something homegrown (please, show it to us!) Something else (please, tell us about it!)
